mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, budget, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at, is_ended FROM plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plans (user_id, budget, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at, is_ended) VALUES (#{userId}, #{budget}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, now(), null, #{isEnded})
mapper.update: UPDATE plans SET user_id = #{userId}, budget = #{budget}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, updated_at = now(), is_ended = #{isEnded} WHERE id = #{id}
